articles.author: Kuba Stezycki, Janis Laizans, Radovan Stoklasa
articles.title: Central European floods leave trail of devastation; new areas on alert - Reuters
articles.description: Volunteers and emergency workers raced to secure river banks in Poland's historic city of Wroclaw on Tuesday, as nearby municipalities advised residents to evacuate and authorities across central Europe tallied the cost of floods that have wreaked havoc and k…
articles.content: WROCLAW, Poland/OSTRAVA, Czech Republic, Sept 17 (Reuters) - Volunteers and emergency workers raced to secure river banks in Poland's historic city of Wroclaw on Tuesday, as nearby municipalities adv… [+4716 chars]
